run1.title: Nature loop short edition
run1.description: I woke up a little late today so I just decided to take off from my apartment and see if I could get to practice on time, or maybe catch the guys on their way out to pipe. Turns out they went the other way but I was still able to catch them either way. Good run around the nature loop, and we decided to come up on a road that took us by the Ligori's like the Old Post instead of going out to the hospital. It was a little shorter but easier on the elevation.
